process.title: How We Work Together
process.description: No surprises, no mysteries. Here's exactly what working with us looks like.

discovery.title: Discovery Call
discovery.description: We learn about your business, goals, and challenges. No sales pitch—just a conversation to see if we're the right fit. Zero commitment.

proposal.title: Detailed Proposal
proposal.description: You receive a clear scope, timeline, and fixed-price quote. No hidden fees, no "we'll figure it out later." You know exactly what you're getting.

design.title: Design Phase
design.description: You approve every design before we write a single line of code. Unlimited revisions until you're 100% satisfied with the direction.

development.title: Development
development.description: Weekly demos show your project coming to life. You see progress in real-time and can give feedback at every step.

testing.title: Testing & Launch
testing.description: Thorough QA across all devices and browsers. We handle deployment and ensure a smooth, stress-free launch.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: 6 months of bug fixes included free. We're here for you long after launch, ensuring your product keeps performing.

cta.text: Ready to start? Let's talk about your project.

whyUs.title: Why Clients Choose Us
whyUs.description: We're not just developers—we're partners invested in your success

onTime.title: On-Time Delivery
onTime.description: We hit our deadlines. Period. Your project won't drag on for months with endless delays.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Fixed-price quotes after thorough scoping. No hourly surprises, no scope creep costs.

support.title: Post-Launch Support
support.description: We don't disappear after launch. Bug fixes and support included free for 6 months.

communication.title: Clear Communication
communication.description: Weekly updates, responsive communication, your preferred channel. You'll never wonder what's happening.

ownership.title: Full Code Ownership
ownership.description: You own 100% of the code. No licensing fees, no lock-in, no strings attached.

scalable.title: Built to Scale
scalable.description: Architecture designed for growth. Your app will handle 10x your current users without breaking.

faq.title: Common Questions & Concerns
faq.description: Straight answers to the questions every client asks

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: We're happy to chat about your specific situation—no obligation.

questions.question: What if the project goes over budget?
questions.answer: It won't. We provide fixed-price quotes after thorough scoping. In 5 years, we've never exceeded a quoted budget. If scope changes during the project, we discuss pricing transparently before any additional work begins—you'll never be surprised by a bill.

questions.question: I'm not technical—can I still work with you?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Most of our clients aren't technical, and that's perfectly fine. We explain everything in plain English, handle all the technical decisions, and keep you informed without overwhelming you with jargon. You focus on your business; we handle the tech.

questions.question: What happens if something breaks after launch?
questions.answer: You're covered. Every project includes 6 months of free bug fixes and support. If something breaks, we fix it—no questions asked, no extra charges. After the support period, we offer affordable maintenance plans to keep things running smoothly.

questions.question: How do I know you'll actually deliver?
questions.answer: Track record speaks for itself: 98% on-time delivery rate, 50+ successful projects, and clients who come back for more. We also provide weekly progress demos—you'll see your project evolving in real-time, so there are no surprises at the end.

questions.question: What makes you different from cheaper freelancers?
questions.answer: Cheaper often costs more in the long run. We've rescued many projects from freelancers who disappeared or delivered buggy code. With us, you get: fixed pricing (no hourly billing games), professional project management, quality assurance testing, proper documentation, and ongoing support. We're a long-term partner, not a one-off transaction.

questions.question: How long will my project take?
questions.answer: Typical timelines: Simple websites (2-4 weeks), web applications (6-12 weeks), mobile apps (8-16 weeks). We'll give you an accurate timeline during our discovery call, and we're transparent about what affects delivery—we won't promise something we can't deliver.

questions.question: Do you work with startups or just established businesses?
questions.answer: Both! We've helped startups launch their first MVP and scaled enterprise solutions for established companies. What matters is whether we can genuinely help you succeed. If we don't think we're the right fit, we'll tell you honestly.

questions.question: What if I need changes during development?
questions.answer: Changes are normal and expected. Minor adjustments within scope are included. For larger changes, we'll discuss the impact on timeline and budget before proceeding—you're always in control. Our weekly demos help catch any misalignments early, before they become expensive.
